code: @Test public void testToDynamic() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:foo").expectedBodiesReceived("<order uri=\"foo\"/>").     getMockEndpoint("mock:bar").expectedBodiesReceived("<order uri=\"bar\"/>").     template.sendBody("direct:start", "<order uri=\"foo\"/>").     template.sendBody("direct:start", "<order uri=\"bar\"/>").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:start").toD("mock:+language:xpath:/order/@uri").         }     }. }
